Parkour Classes in Scranton

Organized weekly Parkour classes are in the works for the Scranton, Pennsylvania starting in October 2015.

If you live in the Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Luzerne County, or Lackawanna County areas, then Parkour Endure is the closest parkour community to you!

Exact location details and prices of the parkour classes are pending. So I beg you to be patient as details are ironed out.
